name: RPSG - Rock, Paper, Scissors, Gun!
description:
Try to be left with the least amount of cards possible when the timer runs out. But remember; no matter how well you play your cards watch out for the gun.

FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED

All design, development, and music done by myself
